articles.title: Gordon Brown slams export of '10 million' J&J vaccines from South Africa to Europe - News24
articles.description: In a column published in UK paper The Guardian, Brown has spoken out against the exporting of vaccines manufactured in Africa, to Europe.
articles.content:
• Former UK prime minister Gordon Brown has spoken out against inequitable vaccine distribution.
